name: Loan Outstanding
query:
SELECT 
    applicant AS "Employee:Data:120", 
    applicant_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
    GROUP_CONCAT(name ORDER BY posting_date SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Loan:Link/Loan:200",
    SUM(total_payment) AS "Total Payable Amount:Currency:150",
    SUM(total_amount_paid) AS "Total Paid Amount:Currency:150",
    (SUM(total_payment) - SUM(total_amount_paid)) AS "Loan Outstanding:Currency:200"
FROM `tabLoan`
WHERE loan_type = "Staff Loan"
GROUP BY applicant
ORDER BY posting_date, applicant
